subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_01E1_01C9D94E.ADFE4B10
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Yes-perfect example of audible scrying.

What's happening is that the rando=
m audio is just a background used for you to scry into. Infact, if this is =
what is happening, I bet if you could get the "Your mom is calling" message=
 out of your head and listen to that same track on another occasion, you ma=
y hear a completely different message.

This could also be why Frank has re=
ported that his messages change from what he first heard.

In essence, it i=
sn't the physical recording sounds giving you the message, it is your subco=
nscious mind.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kristin Morris 
  T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:01 AM
  Subj=
ect: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.






  Okay I have another one f=
or you to think about.. I tape a session and review it later..  even a day =
later.  Upon review the message that comes over is about something that 'ju=
st happened' while I was reviewing or happened after taping?  Is it possibl=
e that spirit can manipulate the recording AFTER recording has stopped or e=
ven manipulate the audio while reviewing?



  An give you an example of th=
is I was recording one day and I reviewed the audio the next day.  While re=
viewing - about half way through - the message "Your mother is calling" was=
 found.  I saved it and moved on and within two seconds my mom called.  You=
 say it is a coincidence except that I hadn't spoken to my mother in over a=
 year.  During this same conversation with her - we sorta made amends and I=
 told her the story of the 'secret' I had found out about a family member h=
aving a child out of wedlock in the late 1920s.  Quick backstory.. I found =
out about this out-of-wedlock birth through my genealogy research and conta=
cted spirit through the box and I was promptly told to keep it secret and w=
hich I promised to do.



  Well in this conversation with my mom after not=
 speaking for a year I told her what I had found out.  When the telephone c=
onversation ended with my mom. I was amazed that the recording had told me =
she would call right be fore she did - even though the audio was recorded t=
he previous day.  I proceeded to go back to reviewing the audio and the ver=
y first thing I heard was:  THAT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A SECRET - YOU LIED.


=

  Maybe they can manipulate 'real-time' literally????



  k




---------=
---------------------------------------------------------------------

  Fr=
om: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of A=
pril Abercrombie
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:36 AM
  To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.com
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.








  2 di=
fferent things happening-that's why. When you get EVP that everyone underst=
ands, it is outward, in the environment. Not a communication through subcon=
scious means.



  EVP that people swear they hear, but noone else can make=
 sense, may be a message to them via subconscious means. That isn't to say =
that ALL EVP's like this are true messages, I am sure alot are just matrixi=
ng.



  But then that is how the art of scrying starts-matrixing. Like the=
 Rorschach tests. The images you matrix with those gives the psychologist a=
n insight into your mind.



  By gazing into a dark, reflective surface, y=
ou start to see cloudy images. At first, you will just be matrixing faces i=
n the clouds and not getting much substance. Try it, you will see what I am=
 saying. With practice, you start to see clear, concise images.



  I thin=
k that is what happening with audio as well.



  We already know for a fac=
t pareidolia can occur in audio as well as visual stimulus.



    ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 

    From: Eric VanDuzer 

    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com 

    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:19 AM

    Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] Re: I have a question.



    yes I understand its personal to that par=
ticular individual but why can't I hear it.  I have gotten some very person=
al EVPs through the traditional investigation way (not through a box or any=
thing of that matter) that all others have heard.

    On Wed, May 20, 2009=
 at 12:15 PM, April Abercrombie <april@...> wrote:=




    "If one person is not meant to hear it they won't hear it (I guess =
I am not quite ready to believe that one right yet)." 



    I don't know =
for sure about that one either, but I am not ready to discount it either, e=
specially since I stumbled across the possibility of audible scrying. But I=
 am sure alot of people don't believe in scrying at all either.



    What=
 makes it a possibility to me is that so many people are hearing things tha=
t are very personal, but stuff they would not have come up with on their ow=
n.





      ----- Original Message ----- 

      From: Eric VanDuzer 

  =
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:09=
 AM

      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



      I think t=
hat is the problem I am having though Jim.  When you say "work them over ti=
ll you hear them"  to me I should not have to work them over till I hear th=
em.  Yes taking out the ambient and background noise is one thing.  But if =
you just keep on listening to them with different enhancements you are boun=
d to hear something (matrixing).  If one person is not meant to hear it the=
y won't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to believe that one right yet=
).  I think you all know what I am getting at.  

      On Tue, May 19, 200=
9 at 9:11 PM, James W. Hyslope <clockdryve@...> wrote:



      Well,=
 for myself...I don't "clean" them up to much because I really don't know H=
OW :) (well a little bit)Since I've only been at it for a couple weeks. BUT=
 if you can clean up something to where you can FIND what was there to begi=
n with "you have done no harm" I hear alot more than others I guess, and I =
haven't enhanced many of my evp's.*If anyone is able to clean them up...I D=
O promise you will hear what I say is correct)Pretty BOLD statement, but if=
 you are able to clean it up with better software (please do for others too=
) I will be more than happy to "listen" where I made a mistake...I can only=
 LEARN from it :) I have done some DEEP enhancements to a few of my evp's..=
.from the begining I could only hear clicks and thumps.....but after messin=
g with that area, eventually I would hear the true voices (and can tell if =
male or female...approximate age) and understand the mood also....these whe=
re extreamly modified, and I feel that I could NOT have added enough "simpl=
e" enhancements that would ADD a voice....full of emotion and distinct syll=
ables :) And some just can't hear them for what ever reason be it equipment=
 that is used to hear (pc-headphones-speakers-ears) know one has the perfec=
t match of all these things. Check out "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" in the files s=
ection....work them over till you hear them. I really can't do much more :)=
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Eric VanDuzer <evanduzer@...> wrote:
      =
>
      > Now I may be biased to the "investigation" way of doing things. I=
 do clean
      > up evps if I hear something and can't make it out do to a=
mbient noise. So
      > hear is my question. When do you stop cleaning up?=
 Wouldn't to much
      > enhancing "taint" the results? To me the more enh=
ancing you do the less
      > convincing it becomes. I hope noone finds th=
is offensive, it is not meant
      > to be I am just really curious. The w=
ay I look at it is that if you have to
      > do so much enhancing to find=
 anything, was there really something there to
      > begin with. Are we j=
ust making ourselves believe there is something there??
      > 
      > Er=
ic
      >
